title: Termas de Rio Hondo
description: Enjoy a relaxing getaway to the Termas de Río Hondo with our 8-day, 7-night tour package, departing on May 23 from Mendoza and San Juan. Immerse yourself in rejuvenating thermal waters and enjoy a revitalizing experience at the Hotel Canciller, where you'll be greeted with exceptional amenities and first-class service. This package includes access to heated pools so you can relax and revitalize in a tranquil and serene environment. Additionally, you'll enjoy full board, ensuring that every meal is a delightful gastronomic experience. With traveler assistance included, you'll have the peace of mind knowing that you're covered in case of any eventuality during your trip. Join us on this revitalizing getaway and let the Termas de Río Hondo provide you with unparalleled well-being.

title: Cataratas y Termas de Entre Ríos
description: Embark on an unforgettable journey to discover two natural wonders of Argentina: the majestic Iguazu Falls and the relaxing Entre Ríos Hot Springs. Departing on April 23 from Tunuyán, La Consulta, San Rafael, and General Alvear, you'll enjoy 9 days and 5 nights of exploration and relaxation. Our package includes mixed bus transportation for your convenience and accommodation at the Plaza and Lider hotels, where you'll be greeted with warmth and comfort for a pleasant stay. Additionally, you'll enjoy half board, ensuring that each day starts with energy and ends with a delicious dinner. During your trip, you'll marvel at the majesty of the Iguazu Falls and then relax in the Entre Ríos hot springs, letting the thermal waters renew and revitalize you. With medical assistance included, you'll have the peace of mind knowing that we're here to assist you in case of any eventuality. Join us on this unique journey and create unforgettable memories in two of Argentina's most beautiful destinations.
from: Tunuyán, La Consulta, San Rafael, General Alvear

title: Villa de Merlo
description: Enjoy a relaxing getaway in Villa de Merlo with our 5-day, 3-night tour package, departing on May 7 from Las Catitas, Mendoza, and San Martín. Immerse yourself in the natural beauty of this charming town while relaxing in the comfort of the Hotel Cana Blaya, where you'll be greeted with hospitality and exceptional amenities. This package includes mixed bus transportation for your convenience and offers the opportunity to explore Villa de Merlo at your own pace. Additionally, you'll enjoy full board, ensuring that every meal is a delightful gastronomic experience. With medical assistance included, you'll have the peace of mind knowing that you're covered in case of any eventuality during your stay. Join us on this rejuvenating getaway and discover the serenity and charm of Villa de Merlo.

title: Villa Carlos Paz
description: Enjoy some unforgettable days in Villa Carlos Paz, Córdoba, with our 5-day, 3-night tour package, available for departures on April 7 and 13 from Mendoza and San Juan. Take advantage of the opportunity to stay just meters away from the iconic Cuckoo Clock at the Nuevo Centro Hotel, where comfort and exceptional service await you. Our package includes mixed bus transportation for your convenience, allowing you to arrive comfortably at your destination. Additionally, you'll enjoy full board, ensuring that every meal is a delightful gastronomic experience. With medical assistance included, you'll have the peace of mind knowing that you're covered in case of any eventuality during your stay. Join us on this thrilling getaway to Villa Carlos Paz and create unforgettable memories as you explore this charming city nestled in the Cordoba hills.

title: Bariloche
description: Embark on an adventure to the majestic city of Bariloche with our 7-day, 5-night tour package, available for departures on May 13 and 23 from multiple locations including La Consulta, Mendoza, San Juan, San Martín, Tunuyán, San Rafael, and General Alvear. Stay at the cozy Hotel Club House, located just 5 blocks from the civic center and boasting stunning lake views, where comfort and natural beauty combine to provide an unforgettable experience. Our package includes mixed bus transportation for your convenience, allowing you to enjoy the scenery as you head to your destination. Additionally, you'll enjoy full board, ensuring that every meal is a delightful gastronomic experience. With medical assistance included, you'll have the peace of mind knowing that you're covered in case of any eventuality during your stay. Plus, take advantage of our 4x3 promotion so you can enjoy this unique experience at an incredible price! Join us on this exciting adventure and discover the beauty and charm of Bariloche.
from: La Consulta, Mendoza, San Juan, San Martín, Tunuyán, San Rafael, General Alvear.

title: Northwest Argentina
description: Discover the fascinating beauty of Northwest Argentina with our 7-day, 5-night tour package, departing on April 19th from La Paz, Las Catitas, Mendoza, and San Juan. Immerse yourself in the culture and nature of this region while staying at the Hotel Nuevo Premier, where you'll enjoy exceptional amenities. This package includes mixed bus transportation for your convenience and offers you the opportunity to explore the region with half board, ensuring that each meal is a delightful culinary experience. With included medical assistance, you'll have peace of mind knowing you're covered in case of any eventuality during your trip. Additionally, you'll enjoy an exciting itinerary that includes the stunning Quebrada de Humahuaca, as well as visits to Tilcara, Purmamarca, San Salvador de Jujuy, Cafayate, Salta, and San Miguel de Tucumán. Join us on this thrilling adventure and discover the treasures of Northwest Argentina.
from: La Paz, Las Catitas, Mendoza, and San Juan
